directions: In a large bowl, toss the chicken with the lemon juice.  Cover and chill for 2 hours.
Mix the salad dressing, salt, pineapple, grapes, almonds, water chestnuts and lettuce into the chicken until evenly combined.  Chill until serving.
ingredients: 1 cup creamy salad dressing, e.g. Miracle Whip ™
title: Chicken Salad with Toasted Almonds
